snippet: Since new Apple products have been equipped with the Lightning connector, buying a new device also means replacing many accessories, like the music dock. But a piece of hardware about the size of an iPod Shuffle, the dockBoss Air, can come to the...
abstract: Since new Apple products have been equipped with the Lightning connector, buying a new device also means replacing many accessories, like the music dock. But a piece of hardware about the size of an iPod Shuffle, the dockBoss Air, can come to the rescue.

headline.main: The dockBoss Rescues Old Music Docks
headline.print_headline: A Little Piece of Hardware Can Modernize Your Music Dock
